features: 【Personalize】Unlike the black privacy screen protector, our color will change from blue to purple at different angles, making your phone color changeable, cool and unique.

【28° Privacy Protection】Privacy screen protector for iPhone 12 Pro Max, the screen only visible to people within 28°, people beside only see different shades of purple screen. Protect your privacy and sensitive information when in public.

【High Hardness & Sensitive Touch】Tempered glass 9H hardness, making it more impact and scratch-resistant. It perfectly balances privacy protection and sensitive touch, ensuring quick app operation and sensitive gameplaying.

【Anti Blue Light 】Screen protectors can filter out 90% blue light from the screen, making your eyes feel comfortable and healthy even when looking at your phone for a long time. Blue light blocking layers can darken the screen. You can adjust the brightness to your comfort.

【Easy Installation】Package contents include a color privacy screen protector, auxiliary tools, mounting frame, and user manual to make installation easier and bubble-free. We can address any issues or concerns you have with 24 hour online service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! Applies flawlessly, endures!
reviews.reviewText: This is my second purchase of this screen protector. It’s made a very thick material. I dropped my phone off and it doesn’t crack or break. It goes on flawlessly, and the purple is really beautiful from the side, and You cannot see any type of tint to the screen when you’re using the phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional and Effective!!!
reviews.reviewText: Dropped my phone face down within two days of putting this on and the entire shield fractured but NOT my phone’s screen! Very happy with this purchase and the best part is my daughter can no longer view my texts and no one around me can either!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to install and works well
reviews.reviewText: People think I got a new phone. Very clean look. Impossible to see my screen from beside me. The tint looks amazing and is barely noticeable with the screen on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the purchase
reviews.reviewText: This privacy screen was well tested! I drive a tow truck and my phone is mounted vertically on an air vent. Riders in my truck could not see my screen content. My phone dropped more than a few times and the screen protector did its job! Made of feeder quality my cellphone screen is still in perfect condition.Screen was easy to maintain and keep clean. Protector didn't effect the touch sensitivity. After two years the protector finally cracked. I just recently replaced it with another one of these protectors. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this screen protector. It keeps your screen private but I also just love the color and it’s real easy to apply with the whole kit. It also does hold up very well. I drop my phone a lot and while the screen protector itself has broken/cracked my actual screen is perfect underneath!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was a nice product until I used it in the day time. It seems it was particularly made for night time use. In the day time I can’t hardly see my screen even when I angle it or turn it to where I’m supposed to see my screen. It’s better if you use this screen protector in low light or at night but other than that it is beautiful and easy to clean. Nice quality but not the best because on 10/28/23 I tossed my phone on my drivers side car seat like I normally do with or without a screen protector and now the screen protector has a crack on it. I did have two car keys on my front seat and I’m not sure if it bounced off of it and turned over, but when I went to get in the car and picked up my phone, there is a crack on screen. I have dropped his phone many times and threw his phone on my car seat many times, and my screen has never been cracked or broken, why does this happen with the screen protector? This is the first one I have ever bought. Not sure if I’ll ever get another one that will protect my screen and my eyes. Beautiful product but I’m not into something that I will through my money away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy this protector, and it came with a farm so it was easy to install partnered with the step by step instructions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well didn’t last long
reviews.reviewText: The overall function, to be a privacy screen with a purple tint, works great. Super easy installation, went on easy, no mess, 10/10. The privacy part worked very well, you can only see it at certain angles, best view is straight on. The big issue is, I dropped my phone once, not very high, maybe 2 feet off the ground and it cracked in the corner. It is very sensitive, but I suppose it serves the purpose of being a screen protector. Overall, decent product.
Es excelente de verdad!! No se me ha rayado después de dos meses de uso y cumple con su función de proteger la vista, mica de privacidad y sobre todo la protección de tu pantalla.
